sections.heading: Violations; penalty.Any person who shall fail to comply with any of the provisions of sections 57-501 to 57-507 shall be deemed guilty of a Class III misdemeanor
sections.text: Each violation of this section shall constitute a separate offense.SourceLaws 1951, c. 188, ยง 7, p. 698;Laws 1977, LB 39, ยง 56.
